attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Primary education health warning.
We believe SATS kill real education 
There is no time for year 6,2,9 and AS level children to enjoy real education. Cramming and revision is not learning.
How do sats benefit children?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
